description: Connects an array of PricingRuleArns to a defined PricingPlan. The maximum number PricingRuleArn that can be associated in one call is 30.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The PricingPlanArn that the PricingRuleArns are associated with.

parameters.name: PricingRuleArns
parameters.description: The PricingRuleArns that are associated with the Pricing Plan. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The PricingPlanArn that the PricingRuleArns are associated with.
